articles.title: What is NFT, and why it matters in the crypto world - Economic Times
articles.description: Non-fungible tokens (NFTs) are a class of cryptocurrency assets in which each item, or token, is entirely unique. This makes them useless as a currency, but quite useful for other things—such as crypto art.
articles.content:
